value: The new modern town square in Rakvere

is Estonia’s fifth largest city and situated the northern part of the country, 20 km south of the Gulf of Finland and approximately 100km east of

. Its earliest signs of human settlement date back to the 3rd-5th century.

Rakvere is an attractive and rapidly developing town with quite an interesting character; for example, Rakvere is the place where the first Estonian Punk Song Festival took place. It’s also the host to the well-known international rock music festival “Green Christmas.” Since 1994, a biannual international theatre festival, called Baltoscandal has taken place in the unique, friendly and slightly crazy atmosphere of Rakvere. So it’s no wonder, that the motto of Rakvere is “full of power”.

The city is also known in Estonia for its youthful hip-hop and electronic music scene.
Rakvere has a regular bus connection to
and to a number of other cities. Bus schedules can be found at

value: runs a Tallinn-Narva train which stops in Rakvere.
line with a stop in Rakvere.

The public transport buses are operated by GoBus Rakvere – there is a total of 4 bus lines.

name=Lutheran Church of the Holy Trinity

content=is a late medieval church with an unusually high and slender spire that was built in the 17th century. Grave marker of Bishop Arnoldus H. Annabat. Eye-catching Baroque fretwork masterpieces – the pulpit and altar wall.
name=Orthodox Church of the Nativiy of Theotokos
content=Contains the holy remains of the martyred priest Sergei Florinski, which are the only public holy remains in Estonia.

content=Completed in the first half of the 16th century, this castle is a great place to visit, with concerts, events such as archery, guided tours, the notorious "hell" chamber and you can also eat and drink here, meals are faithful medieval recipes with no potatoes!

Rakvere has got several big shopping centres both for clothes and home electronics.

value: content=Heavy Metal/Rock Bar, in the basement not far of a walk from the castle, popular with bikers and headbangers. Has a pool table and a great selection of beer. Great atmosphere on weekends but is open all week.
